name: すずめが戸締り - Suzume locks up the doors
name_original: すずめが戸締り - Suzume locks up the doors
description:
すずめが戸締りをするゲームです。

This is the top-view action game that a sparrow locks up doors.

  • Carry out eggs to the exit
  • Devils take away eggs to their gate
  • You can hit devils to stun from their behind - You can stun devils all by closing their gates
  • Don't be found by devils. They come running to you
  • Carried out all eggs or lost them, go to the exit to finish the stage

X: Close the devil's gate
Z: Attack
